A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
incoherent mess\, betraying the star wars universe and full of plot holes.

space battles were retarded\, especially the bombers. x wings should have bombing capabilities with torpedos\, y wing and bwing also are fighter bombers\, yet what we get in this movie is b2 flying fortresses that are so obviously such a joke in this universe.

as someone that was full star wars nerd in the first years of the 2000s\, no\, this is not a good star wars movie. i even prefer the prequels...
